description: Try our easy to follow Lamb Cutlets With Haloumi, Bean And Potato Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ lamb,Seafood free,Gluten free,Lamb,Egg free,Spring,Low sugar,Potato,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Quick & easy lunch
name: Lamb Cutlets With Haloumi, Bean And Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup flatleaf parsley leaves, roughly chopped
180g haloumi cheese, cut into 1cm thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Boil potatoes until tender. Drain, cool and slice but keep the water to blanch the beans. Season with juice of half a lemon, 2 tablespoons olive oil and salt and freshly ground pepper.
Blanch and drain sliced green beans and add to potatoes.
Preheat barbecue to medium heat. Season lamb cutlets with salt and pepper, lightly oil and cook for 34 minutes on each side and rest.
Cook haloumi on both sides until golden brown. Squeeze with lemon. Toss haloumi with green beans, potatoes, parsley and pomegranate seeds, top with yoghurt and dukkah and serve with the lamb.
